QuestData.Title: The Bones of Xibala
QuestData.Description:
Our allies in the Explorer's League have alerted us to an exciting find. They have set up camp in the Xibala region of Zuldazar.
Make your way to the camp and help them uncover anything that may advance our cause.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Xibala and meet with Acadia Chistlestone.
